### Loading Packages 

```{r message=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(sjmisc)
library(DT)
```

```{r message = F}
# read the data file
Chapman.dat <- read.csv("Chapman.csv")
datatable(Chapman.dat)
```

```{r}
Chapman.dat$CORON2 <- ifelse(Chapman.dat$CORON == 0, "NO", "YES")
datatable(Chapman.dat)
```

```{r}
Chapman.dat %>% select(CORON2) %>% frq()
```
